018package org.tquadrat.shootingtimer;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import org.apiguardian.api.API;
023import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
024import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
025import javafx.fxml.FXML;
026import javafx.scene.control.Button;
027import javafx.stage.Stage;
028
029/**
030 *  The controller for the About window.
031 *
032 *  @version $Id: Action.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $
033 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
034 *  @UMLGraph.link
035 *  @since 0.1.0
036 */
037@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Action.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $" )
038@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
039public class AboutController
040{
041        /*---------*\
042    ====** Methods **==========================================================
043        \*---------*/
044    /**
045     *  Initialises the controller.
046     */
047    @FXML
048    private final void initialize()
049    {
050        /* Just exists */
051    }   //  initialize()
052
053    /**
054     *  The handler for the OK button.
055     *
056     *  @param  event   The button event.
057     */
058    @SuppressWarnings( "static-method" )
059    @FXML
060    private final void onOk( final ActionEvent event )
061    {
062        event.consume();
063
064        //---* Find the window to close *--------------------------------------
065        /*
066         * We know that the triggering event originates from a button - the
067         * only button on the About dialog.
068         * That button is part of the scene that is defined by the FXML file.
069         * So we just walk up the scenes to the root, and from there we take
070         * the Window (which is a Stage, something we know because the dialog
071         * is shown in a Stage).
072         */
073        final var stage = (Stage) ((Button) event.getSource()).getScene()
074            .getRoot()
075            .getScene()
076            .getWindow();
077        stage.close();
078    }   //  onOk()
079}
080//  class AboutController
081
082/*
083 *  End of File
084 */
